item.description:
Do you like French music? Latin American music? Music that sways and swings? If so, you shouldn't miss this eclectic ensemble from San Fransisco at Johnny D's.

From the Johnny D's website:

Rupa & the April Fishes create fresh music that defies the notion of genre—it is a whimsical magic carpet ride through time and place, mixing sounds from the Far East, Europe, Latin America and the US. They give an unforgettable multilingual performance—with songs in French, Spanish, English, Hindi and Roma that range from raucous to romantic. Take the trip, bring a friend.
item.name: Rupa and the April Fishes
